AffectedIndicatorLED.description: This object is used to represent affected indicator LED information.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LEDIdentifier.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent LED identifier.

LEDState.longDescription: The value of this property shall represents the LED state.

FailingFRUItem.description: This object is used to represent FRU Identifier information.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FRUNumber.description: Represents list of LED Identifiers for the LEDs affected by this logged event.
FRUNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represents list of LED Identifiers for the LEDs affected by this logged event.

FRUSerialNumber.description: Represents list of Serial Numbers for the Failing FRU(s).
FRUSerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represents list of Serial Numbers for the Failing FRU(s). Order of entries in the list corresponds to order in the FailingFRUNumber list.

LenovoLogEntryProperties.description: This is Lenovo extended properties of Lenovo extended log entries information.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AffectedIndicatorLEDs.description: Represents list of LED Identifiers for the LEDs affected by this logged event.
AffectedIndicatorLEDs.longDescription: The value of this property shall represents list of LED Identifiers for the LEDs affected by this logged event.

AuxiliaryData.description: Represents additional details that may be provided for some events.
AuxiliaryData.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array used to represent additional details that may be provided for some events. May be null if not available.

CaseNumber.description: The case number of this event log.
CaseNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall provides the case number of this event log. This property only available in SaLog log service.

CommonEventID.description: Represents the unified event ID across all Lenovo products, including Power, System x and Storage.
CommonEventID.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the unified event ID across all Lenovo products, including Power, System x and Storage.

EventFlag.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the event characteristics. Curently, Only two bits are defined :bit0 indicate to move VM away from this server; bit1 is Event indication processing flag.

EventID.description: Represents an 8-byte binary Event ID. Its format shall be 0xhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.
EventID.longDescription: The value of property shall represent an 8-byte binary Event ID. Its format shall be 0xhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.

EventSequenceNumber.description: Provides a unique, monotonically increasing sequence number for each standard event log.
EventSequenceNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall provides a unique, monotonically increasing sequence number for each standard event log.

EventSeverity.description: The severity of this event log.
EventSeverity.longDescription: The value of this property shall provides the severity of this event log. This property only available in SaLog log service.

EventStatus.description: The status of this event log.
EventStatus.longDescription: The value of this property shall provides the status of this event log. This property only available in SaLog log service.

EventType.description: Describe how the system was impacted.
EventType.longDescription: The value of this property shall describe how the system was impacted.

FailingFRU.description: Represents List of FRU information for the Failing FRU(s).
FailingFRU.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of objects used to represent list of FRU(s). May be null if not known or if event was not caused by a failing FRU.

Hidden.description: Represents whether the log entry is intended to be displayed to normal users.
Hidden.longDescription: The value of this property shall represents whether the log entry is intended to be displayed to normal users.

IsLocalEvent.description: Represents the event occurred at the local node or from other node.
IsLocalEvent.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the event occurred at the local node or from other node.

LenovoMessageID.description: Represents the unified message ID which is defined by Lenovo.
LenovoMessageID.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the unified message ID which is defined by Lenovo.

RawDebugLogURL.description: Contains a URL of HTTPS where stores the raw debug data for Trust Source Log.
RawDebugLogURL.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a URL of HTTPS where stores the raw debug data for Trust Source Log

RelatedEventID.description: Contains one or multiple related event IDs.
RelatedEventID.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain one or multiple related event IDs.

ReportingChain.description: Represents the path which the event was reported through.
ReportingChain.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the path which the event was reported through. Each management stack adds a tag so the reporting chain is understood and can be expanded to cover the reporting path using two consecutive colons as a delimiter.

Serviceable.description: Represents whether the event should be Serviced by Lenovo, by the customer, or neither.
Serviceable.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent whether the event should be Serviced by Lenovo, by the customer, or neither.

Source.description: Represents the origin of the event leading to the log entry.
Source.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the origin of the event leading to the log entry.

TSLVersion.description: Contains the Version filed in TSL information.
TSLVersion.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the Version filed in TSL information.

TotalSequenceNumber.description: The total sequence number in both audit and platform log entries.
TotalSequenceNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall provides the total sequence number in both audit and platform log entries.

StandardLogEntry.description: This object is used to be a reference to Event resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AffectedIndicatorLEDs.description: Represents list of LED Identifiers for the LEDs affected by this logged event.
AffectedIndicatorLEDs.longDescription: The value of this property shall represents list of LED Identifiers for the LEDs affected by this logged event.

AuxiliaryData.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array used to represent additional details that may be provided for some events. May be null if not available.

Hidden.longDescription: The value of this property shall represents whether the log entry is intended to be displayed to normal users.

IsLocalEvent.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the event occurred at the local node or from other node.

LenovoMessageID.description: Represents the unified message ID which is defined by Lenovo.
LenovoMessageID.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the unified message ID which is defined by Lenovo.

RawDebugLogURL.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a URL of HTTPS where stores the raw debug data for Trust Source Log

RelatedEventID.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain one or multiple related event IDs.

ReportingChain.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the path which the event was reported through. Each management stack adds a tag so the reporting chain is understood and can be expanded to cover the reporting path using two consecutive colons as a delimiter.

Serviceable.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent whether the event should be Serviced by Lenovo, by the customer, or neither.

title: #LenovoLogEntry.v1_0_0
